REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3549 reute h f BC-ICOT-<ICOT.O>-TO-BUY 10-20 0042

TEXT.TITLE: ICOT <ICOT.O> TO BUY BACK MOST OF ITS SHARES
TEXT.BODY:
ICOT Corp said it will periodically repurchase up to 7,500,000 of its 10,800,000 outstanding shares. The company said funds for the buy-back will come from working capital.
Reuter
